capabilityDescription.en: Modifies the contents of a FlowFile that contains Record-oriented data (i.e. data that can be read via a RecordReader and written by a RecordWriter) by removing selected fields. This Processor requires that at least one user-defined Property be added. The name of the property is ignored by the processor, but could be a meaningful identifier for the user. The value of the property should indicate a RecordPath that determines the field to be removed. The processor executes the removal in the order in which these properties are added to the processor. Set the "Record Writer" to "Inherit Record Schema" in order to use the updated Record Schema modified when removing Fields.
capabilityDescription.zh: Modifies the contents of a FlowFile that contains Record-oriented data (i.e. data that can be read via a RecordReader and written by a RecordWriter) by removing selected fields. This Processor requires that at least one user-defined Property be added. The name of the property is ignored by the processor, but could be a meaningful identifier for the user. The value of the property should indicate a RecordPath that determines the field to be removed. The processor executes the removal in the order in which these properties are added to the processor. Set the "Record Writer" to "Inherit Record Schema" in order to use the updated Record Schema modified when removing Fields.

en.description: Any field that matches the RecordPath set as the value will be removed.
en.value: A RecordPath to the field to be removed.

zh.description: Any field that matches the RecordPath set as the value will be removed.
zh.value: A RecordPath to the field to be removed.

en.description: Specifies the Controller Service to use for writing out the records

zh.description: 指定用于写入记录的控制器服务

en.description: Specifies the Controller Service to use for reading incoming data

zh.description: 指定用于读取传入数据的控制器服务

failure.en: If a FlowFile cannot be transformed from the configured input format to the configured output format, the unchanged FlowFile will be routed to this relationship
failure.zh: 如果FlowFile无法从配置的输入格式转换为配置的输出格式，则未更改的FlowFile将被路由到此关系

success.en: FlowFiles that are successfully transformed will be routed to this relationship
success.zh: 成功转换的FlowFiles将路由到此关系

record.error.message.en: This attribute provides on failure the error message encountered by the Reader or Writer.
record.error.message.zh: 此属性在失败时提供读取器或写入器遇到的错误消息。
